about_the_game:
Unlock the Sandstone die to let loose the fiends of the desert!

This DLC allows you to bring the Sandstone die into any battle. It offers new pieces and buffs, and its offerings may be purchased by either player in a match.

Featuring:
  • The Mummy: A powerful summoning piece that traps foes in bandages and conjures exploding scarabs to pursue them.
  • The Scorpion: A Ranged piece that launches deadly poison and follows up with a devastating melee combo.
